sentences.en: A scallop of the genus Pecten.
sentences.cn: 盛在扇贝壳中的海鲜食品.

sentences.en: According to the latest Scallop Poll , fear of sharks is at an all - time high.
sentences.cn: 根据最近的鹦鹉螺的记载, 鲨鱼的威胁无时不在.

sentences.en: Delicious fresh scallop meat and is internationally recognized, senior aquatic products.
sentences.cn: 扇贝肉鲜嫩味美,是国际公认的高级水产品.

sentences.en: Dinner, scallop and oyster unlimited supply, lunch and limited supply.
sentences.cn: 晚市时,扇贝、生蚝为无限量供应, 午市则限量供应哦.

sentences.en: Here is your fried rice with scallop, sir.
sentences.cn: 这是您的干贝炒饭, 先生.

sentences.en: Looks like is fluttering scallop in canyon.
sentences.cn: 雾气大得看起来像是在峡谷招展扇贝.

sentences.en: Lug valves are furnished in scallop and full body designs.
sentences.cn: 凸耳阀门具有扇形结构和全阀体结构.

sentences.en: On the East Coast of the U.S., where large predatory sharks have also been overfished, cownose ray populations have exploded, taking a bite — literally — out of the bay scallop fishery.
sentences.cn: 在大型掠食鲨鱼被过度捕捞的美国东海岸，牛鼻鳐的数量爆炸式增长，狠狠地“咬伤”了当地的海湾扇贝养殖业。

sentences.en: Our main exporting products: pollock fillets , yellow fin sole fillets, cod fillets, red snapper fillets, salmon fillets, scallop, etc.
sentences.cn: 主要出口产品有: 鳕鱼片、鲽鱼片 、 真鳕片、红鱼片 、 马哈鱼片 、 扇贝丁等其它类产品.

sentences.en: Some people like to eat scallop.
The Celestial Cave Restaurant the only under the sun that sells shrimp and scallop dumplings.
sentences.cn: 出售虾仁弯梳饺的仙人居餐馆,天下独此一家.

sentences.en: The fanned scallop shells are also seen on the front legs of period chairs.
sentences.cn: 煽动扇贝的贝壳也被前面的腿的椅子期间.

sentences.en: The gilded, scallop - embellished plates at Serena's table exude Fall warmth, with a glamorous touch.
sentences.cn: 面前镀金镶边的盘子使得本来冷冰冰的瓷器拥有了秋天的温暖.

sentences.en: The rays in turn decimated the bay scallop populations around North Carolina.
sentences.cn: 而它们转而大量 捕食了美国北卡罗来纳州的海湾扇贝。

sentences.en: The scallop flavour was extraoted and refined from the fresh scallop juice.
sentences.cn: 扇贝香味料是以新鲜扇贝汁为原料精制而成的.

sentences.en: The various sea - food have prawn, shrimp scallop perch.
sentences.cn: 海鲜类有基围虾、毛蟹 、 带子、桂花鱼等等.

sentences.en: Wash scallop and soak in water for 2 hours . Tear into shreds.
sentences.cn: 瑶柱洗净,用清水浸2小时后撕碎.

sentences.en: You can also expect plenty of olive oil, mushrooms, and seafood like scallop, shrimps, squid and mussels, paired with good Spanish wines.
sentences.cn: 你也可以要求用很多的橄榄油，蘑菇和海鲜，就像扇贝，虾，乌贼和蚌和极好的西班牙酒搭配在一起。

trans.tran_en: a small sea creature that you can eat, with a flat round shell made of two parts that fit together
